text: Lohmer is an unincorporated community in Barry County, in the U.S. state of Missouri. The community is located on Missouri Route 76, east of Cassville and within the Mark Twain National Forest.Missouri Atlas & Gazetteer, DeLorme, 1998, First edition, p. 61, ==History== A variant name was Lohmansburg. A post office called Lohmansburg was established in 1891, and remained in operation until 1906. The community was named after Henry Lohmar, an early settler. ==References== Category:Unincorporated communities in Barry County, Missouri Category:Unincorporated communities in Missouri
title: Lohmer, Missouri
